title: charmeause 🍰 perc’ahlia
body:
“I was, um. Don’t take this the wrong way, but I was expecting something smaller,” he laughs, reaching out to gently swish the satin against her hip.

“Smaller?” Vex takes a step back, and peers down at herself beneath the hem of her dress. “Smaller than this, even?”

He cringes, and shakes his head. “No, no– I mean. Not as… important. Or pretty.” Percy takes the material of the hem between his fingers and absently feels at the embroidery, eyes locked onto her and her scrunched nose of confusion. “When you said you’d be right back, my mind had gone to those little rabbit slippers, not… lingerie.”

Rating: E
Ship: Percival de Rolo / Vex’ahlia
Word Count: 6803
Notes: couldn’t find any fun vex lingerie fic, which is a crime, because you know she would have a field day with that sort of thing, so! here’s some lovebirds fucking. enjoy! ♡

⋆ Read on AO3 here! ⋆

tags: ok last post about this for a while I promise this time
summary: If you honestly think that the problem in the CritRole fandom is that people give the women too much of a pass and pile on the...
body: If you honestly think that the problem in the CritRole fandom is that people give the women too much of a pass and pile on the men for complex character choices or jokes…I don’t know what reality you’re living in, but it’s not the same one I’m experiencing. That’s a baffling conclusion to come to.

reblog.comment: If you honestly think that the problem in the CritRole fandom is that people give the women too much of a pass and pile on the men for complex character choices or jokes…I don’t know what reality you’re living in, but it’s not the same one I’m experiencing. That’s a baffling conclusion to come to.

trail.content_raw: If you honestly think that the problem in the CritRole fandom is that people give the women too much of a pass and pile on the men for complex character choices or jokes…I don’t know what reality you’re living in, but it’s not the same one I’m experiencing. That’s a baffling conclusion to come to.
trail.content: If you honestly think that the problem in the CritRole fandom is that people give the women too much of a pass and pile on the men for complex character choices or jokes…I don’t know what reality you’re living in, but it’s not the same one I’m experiencing. That’s a baffling conclusion to come to.

blog.name: kacka07
blog.title: There is freedom in the dark.
blog.description:
KATE / 22 / CZECH
-
"Odysseus, on his journey home to Ithaca, is visited by a ghost. The ghost tells him that once he reaches his home — once he slays all his enemies and sets his house in order — he must do one last thing before he can rest. The ghost tells him to pick up an oar and walk inland, and keep walking until somebody mistakes that oar for a shovel. For that would be a place where no man had ever been troubled by the sea, and that's where he'd find peace."

summary: nott, speaking words of wisdom: just keep him guessing. did i say something? did i do something? was i a bad kisser? and that'll...
body: nott, speaking words of wisdom: just keep him guessing. did i say something? did i do something? was i a bad kisser? and that'll put him on the defensive, where you want him! and then you cUT HIS THROAT AND FUCKING KILL HIM!!

blog.name: robindesanto
blog.title: shine bright circus man
blog.description:
Hi I post about webcomics and podcasts

Dina Saruyama is the loml and Leslie Bean is my mom

I also love Critical Role, like, SO much and I listen to it primarily in podcast form so I decided it counts for here 🤷🏻‍♀️

I tag nearly everything CR spoilers bc my friend follows this blog and hasn’t watched any yet

I am 21 years old

Personal favorites are Questionable Content, Shortpacked!, and El Goonish Shive. As for podcasts, The Cryptid Keeper and Critical Role (haven’t listened to the first campaign yet!)

tags: like if fjord was doing this to jester y'all would be demanding travis's head
though let's be real fandom in general has a really skeevy double standard when it comes to female characters doing skeevy shit
summary: You know, I guess I shouldn't really be surprised this fandom has a really gross double standard in regard to female & male...
body: You know, I guess I shouldn’t really be surprised this fandom has a really gross double standard in regard to female & male characters after Jester groped an obviously uncomfortable Fjord under the guise of medical care and y'all tripped over yourselves making fanart of it and celebrated it as a cute ship moment.

reblog.comment: You know, I guess I shouldn’t really be surprised this fandom has a really gross double standard in regard to female & male characters after Jester groped an obviously uncomfortable Fjord under the guise of medical care and y'all tripped over yourselves making fanart of it and celebrated it as a cute ship moment.

trail.content_raw: You know, I guess I shouldn’t really be surprised this fandom has a really gross double standard in regard to female & male characters after Jester groped an obviously uncomfortable Fjord under the guise of medical care and y'all tripped over yourselves making fanart of it and celebrated it as a cute ship moment.
trail.content: You know, I guess I shouldn’t really be surprised this fandom has a really gross double standard in regard to female & male characters after Jester groped an obviously uncomfortable Fjord under the guise of medical care and y'all tripped over yourselves making fanart of it and celebrated it as a cute ship moment.

blog.name: criticalfic
blog.title: Critical Role fic recs
blog.description: A Critical Role fic rec blog. Submissions/requests/suggestions very welcome as I get this up and running!

summary: (you'll see, you'll be) the picture of your dreams
title: (you'll see, you'll be) the picture of your dreams
body:
(you’ll see, you’ll be) the picture of your dreams by lakilaes (2,064 words)

Set mid- to early-campaign 1. I only started watching Campaign 1 pretty shortly before it ended, so I sometimes feel a little behind on some things. One of those is Percy/Vax. I adore Percy/Vex, in canon and in fic, but I’m really intrigued by the possibilities of Vax and Percy together. This is a short fic, but it’s very very cute. I love how the author writes Vax with a crush—it feels very accurate to the character, and also to the experience of having a crush, especially one you realize all at once.

reblog.comment:
(you’ll see, you’ll be) the picture of your dreams by lakilaes (2,064 words)
